Articles.Content:
Hello! I have recently made a decent (non-stock) version of the Hubble Space Telescope, and will try to keep this updated with it's latest images! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

 (The .craft file is not available at the moment, as I am having issues with the VAB not saving it into a .craft file)

The Kubble Space Telescope:

![WojRR1T.png](http://i.imgur.com/WojRR1T.png)

The MÃƒÂ¼n with Small Zoom:

![K50ukNH.png](http://i.imgur.com/K50ukNH.png)

The MÃƒÂ¼n with Medium Zoom:

![BbmoT85.png](http://i.imgur.com/BbmoT85.png)

The MÃƒÂ¼n with High Zoom:

![2yaT7KT.png](http://i.imgur.com/2yaT7KT.png)

Please let me know what you think of the design, or what I should image next ^^ (Also whether it would be preferred to link the images or to display them)

 - Vivian V.
Perhaps you should send a second one up so we can get a close-up of the craft itself?

> 
> Perhaps you should send a second one up so we can get a close-up of the craft itself?

He, he, good one!

Nice telescope! Remember never point it at the sun, it can cause permanent eye damage to your kerbals. (See the "Kerbals don't blink" part of my signature)
Your K and H keys seem to have been arbitrarily swapped there. Interesting design otherwise, though.

See if you can spot Jool and it's moons. Not easy due to resolution scaling, but definitely possible:

> ![CkKeQjv.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/CkKeQjv.jpg)

I personally think something like this should be added as a science part to the game, like a telescope camera, doesn't have to take screenshots though, but it would be nice ot make a kerbal telescope.

> 
> He, he, good one!
> Nice telescope! Remember never point it at the sun, it can cause permanent eye damage to your kerbals. (See the "Kerbals don't blink" part of my signature)

Valentina might blink, one cannot have eyelashes (true eyelashes) without eyelids.
I definitely will! I thought that it looked quite nice with Kerbin in the background. ^^

Ah, no they were not. It is supposed to be that way! I put it that way because during the loading screen one of the lines of text says "Adding K to every word" hence the Kubble Space Telescope. I hope that makes sense ^^

That will most definitely been in with the next pictures! ^^

- - - Updated - - -

There is a mod that includes a Hubble Space Telescope-like telescope. It's called the Zeus Space Telescope. But I totally agree that there should be science around telescopic views in the game! ^^
This exchange of spacecraft has been moved to the Spacecraft Exchange. Please do add the craft file when you can.
